00017 class ConnectionProxy;

00022 class GAIA_LOCAL Connection {
00023   public:
00024     // Number presentation type for caller id display
00025     enum Presentation {
00026         PRESENTATION_NONE = 0,
00027         PRESENTATION_ALLOWED = 1,  // normal
00028         PRESENTATION_RESTRICTED = 2,  // block by user
00029         PRESENTATION_UNKNOWN = 3,  // no specified or unknown by network
00030         PRESENTATION_PAYPHONE = 4
00031     // show pay phone info
00032     };
00033 
00034     enum DisconnectCause {
00035         /* has not yet disconnected */
00036         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_NOT_DISCONNECTED,
00037         /* an incoming call that was missed and never answered */
00038         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_INCOMING_MISSED,
00039         /* normal; remote */
00040         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_NORMAL,
00041         /* normal; local hangup */
00042         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_LOCAL,
00043         /* outgoing call to busy line */
00044         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_BUSY,
00045         /* outgoing call to congested network */
00046         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CONGESTION,
00047         /* not presently used; dial() returns null */
00048         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_MMI,
00049         /* invalid dial string */
00050         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_INVALID_NUMBER,
00051         /* cannot reach the peer */
00052         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_NUMBER_UNREACHABLE,
00053         /* cannot reach the server */
00054         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_SERVER_UNREACHABLE,
00055         /* invalid credentials */
00056         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_INVALID_CREDENTIALS,
00057         /* calling from out of network is not allowed */
00058         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_OUT_OF_NETWORK,
00059         /* server error */
00060         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_SERVER_ERROR,
00061         /* client timed out */
00062         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_TIMED_OUT,
00063         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_LOST_SIGNAL,
00064         /* eg GSM ACM limit exceeded */
00065         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED,
00066         /* an incoming call that was rejected */
00067         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_INCOMING_REJECTED,
00068         /* radio is turned off explicitly */
00069         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_POWER_OFF,
00070         /* out of service */
00071         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_OUT_OF_SERVICE,
00072         /* No ICC, ICC locked, or other ICC error */
00073         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_ICC_ERROR,
00074         /* call was blocked by call barring */
00075         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CALL_BARRED,
00076         /* call was blocked by fixed dial number */
00077         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_FDN_BLOCKED,
00078         /* call was blocked by restricted all voice access */
00079         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CS_RESTRICTED,
00080         /* call was blocked by restricted normal voice access */
00081         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CS_RESTRICTED_NORMAL,
00082         /* call was blocked by restricted emergency voice access */
00083         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CS_RESTRICTED_EMERGENCY,
00084         /* Unassigned number (3GPP TS 24.008 table 10.5.123) */
00085         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_UNOBTAINABLE_NUMBER,
00086         /* MS is locked until next power cycle */
00087         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_LOCKED_UNTIL_POWER_CYCLE,
00088         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_DROP,
00089         /* INTERCEPT order received, MS state idle entered */
00090         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_INTERCEPT,
00091         /* MS has been redirected, call is cancelled */
00092         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_REORDER,
00093         /* service option rejection */
00094         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_SO_REJECT,
00095         /* requested service is rejected, retry delay is set */
00096         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_RETRY_ORDER,
00097         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_ACCESS_FAILURE,
00098         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_PREEMPTED,
00099         /* not an emergency call */
00100         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_NOT_EMERGENCY,
00101         /* Access Blocked by CDMA network */
00102         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_CDMA_ACCESS_BLOCKED,
00103         DISCONNECT_CAUSE_ERROR_UNSPECIFIED
00104     };
00105 
00106     enum PostDialState {
00107         /* The post dial string playback hasn't
00108          been started, or this call is not yet
00109          connected, or this is an incoming call */
00110         POST_DIAL_STATE_NOT_STARTED,
00111         /* The post dial string playback has begun */
00112         POST_DIAL_STATE_STARTED,
00113         /* The post dial string playback is waiting for a
00114          call to proceedAfterWaitChar() */
00115         POST_DIAL_STATE_WAIT,
00116         /* The post dial string playback is waiting for a
00117          call to proceedAfterWildChar() */
00118         POST_DIAL_STATE_WILD,
00119         /* The post dial string playback is complete */
00120         POST_DIAL_STATE_COMPLETE,
00121         /* The post dial string playback was cancelled
00122          with cancelPostDial() */
00123         POST_DIAL_STATE_CANCELLED,
00124         /* The post dial string playback is pausing for a
00125          call to processNextPostDialChar*/
00126         POST_DIAL_STATE_PAUSE
00127     };
00128
